}} 'Preventive Medicine' is a peer-reviewed medical journal published by
Elsevier since 1972. It covers all aspects of preventive medicine and public
health. The editor-in-chief is Alfredo Morabia (City University of New
York). The founding editor was Ernst Wynder.
